question.text: In what order the reagents <math><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi></math> , <math><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></math> and <math><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></math> are added to an aqueous solution containing  <math> <mrow> <msup> <mrow> <mtext>Ag</mtext></mrow> <mo>+</mo></msup><mo>,</mo><msup> <mrow> <mtext>Cu</mtext></mrow> <mrow> <mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow> </msup> </mrow> </math> and <math> <mrow> <msup> <mrow> <mtext>Ni</mtext></mrow> <mrow> <mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow> </msup> </mrow> </math> ions in order to precipitate <math><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math> first <math><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">u</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math> second and <math><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math> last.

options.text: <math><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi></math>

solution.text:
With NaCl only Ag+ precipitates Ag++NaCl↓+Na+
With Nal,Cu+2 precipitates 2Cu+2+4I-→Cu2I2↓+I2
With Na2S,Ni+2 precipitates Ni+2+Na2S→NiS↓+2Na+
